title: Can we file an RTI for pesu placements???

comments.body:
Did you,....

Maybe



Try talking to the placement coordinator?
RTIs are for government bodies and companies undertaking public duties, not for private companies doing their thing.
Some private clgs also are their which give placement stats by rti, like former gov clg converted into private are under right to information. From what I hv heard.

[UGC's website](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwiep7mtuOX_AhX11DgGHalODPQQFnoECBAQAw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ugc.gov.in%2Fsubpage%2Frti-act.aspx%23%3A~%3Atext%3DAll%2520Universities%2520and%2520Colleges%2520established%2CPublic%2520Authority%2520under%2520this%2520Act.&usg=AOvVaw2X_Kui3DZLzJqRmqnzxUQ_&opi=89978449) states *"All Universities and Colleges* ***established by law made by Parliament or by State Legislature*** *or by notification by the appropriate Government or* ***owned, controlled or substantially financed directly or indirectly by funds provided by the Government*** *shall come within the meaning of a Public Authority under this Act."*  


So I don't think PES would fall under the ambit of RTI.
This is actually annoying... Y would u come here.. go ask the appropriate people.. it's pissing off.

maybe try visiting the placements office and look at the notice board  
all info you need is put up right there
